section.title: Function
section.p: One of the user authorization properties. Specifies a list of users to which full (read-write) access to a database is granted. The list consists of user names separated by commas. Do not put spaces after commas.
When set as a system property, specifies a list of users for which full access to all the databases in the system is granted.
A malformed list of user names raises an exception. Do not specify a user both with this property and in derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers.
section.note: User names, called authorization identifiers, follow the rules of SQL92Identifiers and can be delimited. Specifying a user name that does not follow these rules raises an exception.
